dc_title_s: Plan de Paris sous Charles VII; par A.M. Perrot.
dc_description_s: Includes index in upper right corner of map. Shows Paris at the time of King Charles VII. Pour servir a la lecture de l'Histoire des ducs de Bourgogne par M. de Barante. 1 map; 29 x 37 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
